name: 2008 Dodge 3500
description:
I had lots of "fun" converting this truck it had a decent amount of problems it was easy after it being problematic but now this truck runs flawless i added some options to the truck so its more detailed now it has Simple IC so that's required make sure you have the 5th wheel too since if not some hitches wont work and make sure to unzip the mod Enjoy.

SIMPLE-IC IS REQUIRED FOR PARTS TO WORK Download HERE

Specs
---------------------------------------------------------------------
HP - 314-514

Top Speed - 86MPH

Base Price - $45,275

Credits - Mrboomnastic, Dtg616
